channel.title: Snarks
channel.description:
Suggestion: 1) When using a snark against a human grunt, after a couple of missed shots and it having attacked its target 3 times, the grunt should hit its target one placed shot. I hated how the human grunt had accurate shooting when it came to killing something that was fast and small.
2) Snark A.I: if possible try to improve its intelligence e.g. two targets and two snarks released. one attacks target 1 and the other attacks target 2 If there is a horde of them and the player has managed to climb to a higher area have them try and get to the player some way e.g. stack ontop of each other and have one jump ontop of the pile and then get on the higher area and attack the player
